title: Renegade
description: A rookie cop and a chance meeting with two men. One is strait-laced and perfect. The other is a tattooed, pierced, foul-mouthed criminal. One is everything right and safe. A compliment to her in personality and temperament. The other is all danger, mystery, and contradiction. Entirely wrong for her, yet so perfectly right.When their worlds collide, Lucy Diamond will learn the true meaning of love and sacrifice as she embarks on the road of no return with bad boy, Jude Wallace, and good guy, Ian Clarke. Like a thief in the night, love will take her by surprise.**Originally part of the Branded: A Bad Boy anthology. Now a full-length novel**
author: Jeanne McDonald
